Type 2 Faq-O-Matic
This FAQ-O-Matic covers the 1949 to 1979 Volkswagen bus year models.

Please note that while this Faq-O-Matic covers all of these years, the mailing lists from which it rose are broken up as follows:

1949-1967-The split window busses. Subscription info: http://www.type2.com/vintagebus.html

1968-1979-The bay window busses. Subscription info: http://www.type2.com/type2.html

Anyone can browse this information, but you must be a subscriber to one of these lists to add information to this Faq-O-Matic. Also, note that email addresses are modified to make life hard on spammers. If you wish to write to someone and comment on thier submission, substitute the @ symbol for "AT" and the period for "DOT".
